name: Word Finder
tagline: An application to find exact solution.
body:
### Project Information
This is a word finding application. This application will help you to get exact word from an article. It will also provide you the sentence where the word is located.

It may help you in Affiliate Marketing, SEO , Blog Writing.


### Author
This application is developed by Sakibur Rahman.

### Contact
If you have any query regarding this project you can mail me at : sakibat.net@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
